snippet.title: Milo and the Magpies | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
We are very excited to share that we will be helping Johan Scherft publish his first game!

Johan is a very talented artist who created beautiful paintings for Rusty Lake. Last year he started working on creating his own game - a point-and-click puzzle game in which a cat called Milo has to sneak through gardens while trying to outsmart pestering magpies. With the help from Barthel Brussee (animations), Jeroen Wimmers (coding), Victor Butzelaar (soundtrack) and our publishing program, we decided to help make Johan’s dream become reality. Next stop is working on a first demo, which we hope to release in a month from now - we would be very happy with your feedback!

You can wishlist the game on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1407420/Milo_and_the_Magpies/

Trailer by Bob Rafferty 
Music by Victor Butzelaar
